results.name: Square array T, read by antidiagonals: T(n,k) = 0 if n-k>=1 or if k-n>=3, T(0,0) = T(0,1) = T(0,2) = 1, T(n,k) = T(n-1,k) + T(n,k-1).
comment: An arithmetic hexagon of E. Lucas.
reference: E. Lucas, Théorie des nombres, Albert Blanchard, Paris 1958, Tome 1, p.89
